name: Flippy - memory game with an audible twist
name_original: Flippy - memory game with an audible twist
description:
Have you tried matching cards only with the Audio before?

Flippy has a special feature that enables you to hide the graphics and only match with sound. Simply hit the "Image Button" top right and make sure the audio is on!

You will get your final score after 3 rounds.

Good luck!
